title: Best of The Herd: 12/05/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 12/05/2018
description:
Colin thinks Aaron Rodgers has too much power in Green Bay and now even assistant coaches get fired for wanting to hold him accountable. He thinks there’s no debate that LeBron is the most impactful player of all time. Plus, Nick Wright of FS1's "First Things First" explains why Kevin Durant is being disingenuous and tells Colin why Baker is different than almost any other QB and that’s not a bad thing. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
